title: Interactive Cognitive Games
summary: As an older adult, I want to access a variety of interactive cognitive games tailored to my abilities so that I can maintain my cognitive function and enjoy engaging activities.

title: Guided Physical Activity Challenges
summary: As an active retiree with early-stage cognitive concerns, I want ALFRED to provide guided physical activity challenges so that I can engage in regular exercise tailored to my abilities and receive motivational feedback.

title: Progress Tracking for Activities
summary: As an active retiree with early-stage cognitive concerns, I want to track my progress in physical and cognitive activities so that I can visualize my improvements and stay motivated.

title: Customizable Activity Schedules
summary: As an active retiree with early-stage cognitive concerns, I want to customize my physical and cognitive activity schedules using voice commands so that I can maintain my independence and stay engaged without feeling overwhelmed.

title: Social Interaction Through Activities
summary: As an active retiree with early-stage cognitive concerns, I want to join group activities or challenges through simple voice commands so that I can engage with peers and maintain social connections without feeling monitored.

title: Adaptive Activity Recommendations
summary: As an active retiree with early-stage cognitive concerns, I want ALFRED to analyze my preferences and health data to provide adaptive recommendations for activities so that I can maintain my cognitive abilities and active lifestyle while feeling supported without being monitored.
